titles.title: Reopen Small Businesses Safely Act

To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to issue rules or guidance on the ability of borrowers to use economic injury disaster loan proceeds for covered worker protection expenditures, and for other purposes.
Reopen Small Businesses Safely Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
Reopen Small Businesses Safely Act
This bill requires the Small Business Administration to issue rules or guidance to ensure that an economic injury disaster loan recipient may use loan amounts for covered worker protection expenditures related to the COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019) pandemic.
